SEARCH
Package com.framework.generic.keywords

Interface SeleniumKeywords

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericKeywords
public interface SeleniumKeywords
Interface defining the generic keywords for Selenium operations. This interface encapsulates methods for browser manipulation, element interaction, and other common web automation tasks.

  • Method Details

    • invokeBrowser

      void invokeBrowser(String browser)
      Invokes a browser based on the provided browser type.
      Parameters:
      browser - The type of browser to invoke. Can be "Chrome", "Firefox", "Edge", or "Random".

    • closeBrowsers

      void closeBrowsers()
      Closes all open browsers and cleans up the WebDriver instance.

    • loadUrl

      void loadUrl(String url)
      Navigates to the specified URL in the current browser session.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to navigate to.

    • getDriver

      org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getDriver()
      Retrieves the current WebDriver instance.
      Returns:
      The current WebDriver instance.

    • click

      void click(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Clicks on a given CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to be clicked.

    • click

      void click(CustomWebElement customWebElement, Duration seconds)
      Attempts to click on a given CustomWebElement within the specified duration.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to be clicked.
      seconds - The duration to wait for the element to be clickable.

    • clickUsingJSExecutor

      void clickUsingJSExecutor(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Clicks on a given CustomWebElement using JavaScript Executor.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to be clicked.

    • clickUsingActions

      void clickUsingActions(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Clicks on a given CustomWebElement using Actions class.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to be clicked.

    • enterValue

      void enterValue(CustomWebElement customWebElement, String textToEnter)
      Enters text into a given CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to enter text into.
      textToEnter - The text to be entered.

    • getElement

      org.openqa.selenium.WebElement getElement(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Retrieves the WebElement associated with the provided CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement for which to retrieve the WebElement.
      Returns:
      The WebElement corresponding to the CustomWebElement.

    • getElements

      List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getElements(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Retrieves a list of WebElements associated with the provided CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement for which to retrieve the WebElements.
      Returns:
      A list of WebElements corresponding to the CustomWebElement.

    • getByElement

      org.openqa.selenium.By getByElement(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Retrieves the By locator associated with the provided CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement for which to retrieve the By locator.
      Returns:
      The By locator for the CustomWebElement.

    • waitUntilClickable

      void waitUntilClickable(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Waits until the specified CustomWebElement is clickable.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to wait for.

    • waitUntilClickable

      void waitUntilClickable(CustomWebElement customWebElement, Duration seconds)
      Waits for a specified duration until the CustomWebElement is clickable.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to wait for.
      seconds - The duration to wait until the element is clickable.

    • waitUntilVisible

      void waitUntilVisible(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Waits until the specified CustomWebElement is visible.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to wait for.

    • waitUntilVisible

      void waitUntilVisible(CustomWebElement customWebElement, Duration seconds)
      Waits for a specified duration until the CustomWebElement is visible.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to wait for.
      seconds - The duration to wait until the element is visible.

    • waitUntilInvisible

      void waitUntilInvisible(CustomWebElement customWebElement, Duration seconds)
      Waits for a specified duration until the CustomWebElement is invisible in the DOM.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to wait for.
      seconds - The duration to wait until the element is present.

    • waitUntilAttributePresent

      void waitUntilAttributePresent(CustomWebElement customWebElement, Duration seconds, String attribute, String value)
      Waits until the specified attribute of the given element becomes the expected value within the specified time duration.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The custom web element to check.
      seconds - The maximum time to wait for the attribute to become the expected value, in seconds.
      attribute - The name of the attribute to check.
      value - The expected value of the attribute.
      Throws:
      org.openqa.selenium.TimeoutException - If the attribute does not become the expected value within the specified time.

    • waitUntilPresent

      void waitUntilPresent(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Waits until the specified CustomWebElement is present in the DOM.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to wait for.

    • waitUntilPresent

      void waitUntilPresent(CustomWebElement customWebElement, Duration seconds)
      Waits for a specified duration until the CustomWebElement is present in the DOM.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to wait for.
      seconds - The duration to wait until the element is present.

    • waitUntilURLIsNotEmpty

      void waitUntilURLIsNotEmpty(Duration seconds)
      Waits for a specified duration until the URL of the current page is not empty.
      Parameters:
      seconds - The duration to wait until the URL is not empty.

    • takeScreenshot

      byte[] takeScreenshot()
      Takes a screenshot of the current page.
      Returns:
      A byte array representing the screenshot in PNG format.

    • switchWindow

      void switchWindow(String window, String name)
      Switches the focus of future commands for this driver to the window with the given name/handle.
      Parameters:
      window - The name of the window to switch to.
      name - A descriptive name for the window to assist in logging.

    • getAllWindows

      Set<String> getAllWindows()
      Retrieves the set of window handles which can be used to iterate over all open windows of this WebDriver instance.
      Returns:
      A Set of window handles.

    • getWindowName

      String getWindowName()
      Retrieves the name of the window currently being used in the session.
      Returns:
      The window handle of the current window.

    • getCurrentUrl

      String getCurrentUrl()
      Retrieves the URL of the page currently loaded in the browser.
      Returns:
      The URL of the current page.

    • hoverOn

      void hoverOn(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Hovers over a specified CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to hover on.

    • getAttributeValue

      String getAttributeValue(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element, String attribute)
      Retrieves the value of a given attribute of a WebElement.
      Parameters:
      element - The WebElement from which to retrieve the attribute value.
      attribute - The name of the attribute.
      Returns:
      The value of the specified attribute.

    • getText

      String getText(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement element)
      Retrieves the text of a WebElement.
      Parameters:
      element - The WebElement from which to retrieve the text.
      Returns:
      The text of the specified WebElement.

    • scrollTo

      void scrollTo(CustomWebElement customWebElement)
      Scrolls the browser view to the specified CustomWebElement.
      Parameters:
      customWebElement - The CustomWebElement to scroll to within the browser.
